description: Hybrid vision-plus-language poker stack: YOLO reads the table state, Python crunches odds, GPT narrates the play.

paragraphs: YOLO pipelines decode card suits and ranks at 60 FPS, feeding a feature store that synchronizes live tables with historical playlogs.
A Python decision core scans pot odds, Nash ranges, and bluff frequencies before handing intent prompts to GPT for natural language output.
RETRO TAKEAWAY: EXPLAINABLE DECISIONS KEPT HUMAN PLAYERS ENGAGED LONGER THAN RAW WIN RATES.
